column3: Well, if it ain't <Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>! You probably don't remember me, but suffice it to say, I remember you! Aye, I'll never forget the face of the <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> who helped me turn my life around! But enough of that!

It's around this area that people have been spottin' 'em Bombard buggers, so I brought my elbsts down here to assist adventurers and guild members lookin' to aid in the extermination of the fiery fiends. Lucky for you, eh?
She ain't to yer likin'? A right shame that is. Lemme see if I can't find you a better fit!
